review:
It is a very heart touching movies. Whenever I watch this movie, I start crying. The story and the song is very emotional.
The movie tells that a girl's childishness can ruin a person's career and the person who love that girl can consider you a cheater. I request everyone especially girls to watch this movie.
I love this film bewafa sanam very much. And the songs of this film are very good. I like the songs  accha sila diya tune mere pyar ka and yeh dhoke pyar ke dhoke very much.

I think is film k Actor ko or movie bhi bnani thi.Good actor.

Krishan Kumar maybe a good actor with good scripts and a producers brother. But he really needed a good haircut & eyebrow job. Which really put me off in looking at his face.
